articles.author: Alex Kirkland, Rodrigo Faez
articles.title: Real Madrid's Casemiro intent on joining Man United - Carlo Ancelotti
articles.description: Casemiro wants to leave Real Madrid in order to sign for Premier League side Manchester United, coach Carlo Ancelotti said on Friday.
articles.content:
Casemiro wants to join Manchester United, Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti has confirmed, saying the midfielder wants "a new challenge" away from the Bernabeu.

articles.title: San Diego Padres star Fernando Tatis Jr. meets with club president, expected to address teammates before end of week, source says
articles.description: Suspended Padres star Fernando Tatis Jr. met with Padres president of baseball operations A.J. Preller on Thursday and he's expected to address his teammates before the end of the week, a source said.

articles.author: Brady Henderson
articles.title: Seattle Seahawks' Damien Lewis carted off field with ankle injury; X-rays negative
articles.description: Seattle Seahawks starting left guard Damien Lewis left Thursday's preseason game with a lateral ankle sprain, and coach Pete Carroll said X-rays came back negative.
articles.content: SEATTLE -- Seahawks starting left guard Damien Lewis left Lumen Field on the back of an injury cart after suffering a lateral ankle sprain during Thursday night's 27-11 preseason loss to the Chicago … [+3313 chars]

articles.title: Albert Pujols' pinch-hit grand slam backs fellow 40-something Adam Wainwright's gem for St. Louis Cardinals
articles.description: The Cardinals are the first team in MLB history to have a player at least 40 years old hit a grand slam (Albert Pujols) and another at least 40 to pitch seven shutout innings (Adam Wainwright) in the same game.
articles.content: ST. LOUIS -- Albert Pujols launched a pinch-hit grand slam and drove in five runs, Adam Wainwright pitched seven sharp innings and the St. Louis Cardinals routed the Colorado Rockies 13-0 Thursday fo… [+2976 chars]

articles.title: Little League World Series player hurt in bunk bed fall out of intensive care, takes steps with assistance
articles.description: The family of a 12-year-old Little League World Series player from Utah who sustained a head injury after falling from a bunk bed said he has been moved from intensive care and is able to sit up, eat and take steps with support.

articles.title: Tampa Bay Buccaneers coach Todd Bowles noncommittal on Tom Brady's return

articles.title: Robert Lewandowski has €70k watch stolen outside Barcelona training ground
articles.description: Robert Lewandowski had his watch, worth around €70,000, stolen when he stopped for supporters on his way to Barcelona training on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Robert Lewandowski had his watch, worth around 70,000 ($71,000), stolen when he stopped for supporters on his way to Barcelona training on Wednesday.
